articles.content: Former WWE wrestler Ted DiBiase Jr. has been charged for his involvement in the largest corruption case in the history of Mississippi. The entire welfare scandal is about the misappropriation of roug… [+2869 chars]

articles.title: The 10 Best Movies and TV Shows to Watch This Weekend - Vulture
articles.description: Vulture picks the best new movies and TV shows streaming on Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, and HBO Max or to see in theaters on the weekend of April 21. Recommendations include ‘Evil Dead Rise,’ ‘Mrs. Davis,’ ‘Beau Is Afraid,’ ‘Dead Ringers,’ and more.
